Description.Name: Clan Corgi
Description.Details:
Become an Ilkhan and save your fellow clan members!
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkAssassin],Assassin]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkCriminal],Criminal]]
Unit: 'Command Mech' 'Mech
Equipment: assorted Quicksell 'Clan' Gear

OptionDescription: After years of been attacked by various clans for been an outcast, you and your fellow Darkcaste members hatch a plan.
Intro: With a following behind you, you finally had the tools and resources available to you to finally start your revenge against anyone who would call you 'Pirate' or 'Outcast'
BioDescription: After finding it hard to buy even decent mechs from reputable places, you were forced to turn to Quicsell Company, promised gear and mechs that would emulate Clan mechs, assured from demonstrations from mechs they had allready produced, you signed a deal and paid most of what you'd earned so far as a pirate, finally supplied with mechs and gear you needed to survive and fight back.
